From the strength of Ben Marwoods debut album, I have been eagerly anticipating his follow up and wondering what he will do next. Ben is one of those unique writers who can quip a phrase that captures what takes other artists five albums to achieve. If I had any criticisms on this album it would be that I found it too short, it is 14 tracks long and it ends perfectly with the mournful acapella track Lake Wales, however I still found myself wanting more.
